episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Rural Smart Solutions
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Rural Smart Solutions.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down LLM Black Boxes: The Observability Crisis Gripping AI-Driven SaaS and How Artisan Grains Helped Skagit County Rebuild Its Economy, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into rural smart solutions, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
